entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:26 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -13.4°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
